mapper.update: update pw_order_item set is_recycle = 1, recycle_time = now() where ID = #{itemId} and is_recycle = 0 and is_return = 0 and DEPT_ID = #{deptId}
update pw_order_item set is_return = 1, return_time = now() where ID = #{itemId} and is_return = 0 and is_recycle = 0 and DEPT_ID = #{deptId}
mapper.select: SELECT *, ifnull(CONCAT(ROUND(t2.yhsCount / t1.yxsCount * 100, 2), '%'), '0.00%') percentage FROM (SELECT ifnull(sum(oi.number), 0) yxsCount, ifnull(sum((oi.price + oi.deposit) * oi.number), 0) price FROM pw_order_item oi left join sys_dept d on d.dept_id = oi.dept_id left join sys_user u on u.user_id = oi.user_id WHERE is_return = 0 ${params.dataScope}) t1, (SELECT ifnull(count(oi.number), 0) yhsCount FROM pw_order_item oi left join sys_dept d on d.dept_id = oi.dept_id left join sys_user u on u.user_id = oi.user_id WHERE is_recycle = 1 ${params.dataScope}) t2, (SELECT ifnull(count(oi.number), 0) dqyCount FROM pw_order_item oi left join sys_dept d on d.dept_id = oi.dept_id left join sys_user u on u.user_id = oi.user_id WHERE is_clear = 0 and is_recycle = 1 ${params.dataScope}) t3

mapper.select: select * from sys_dept where del_flag = 0 and parent_id = #{deptId}

select *, ifnull(CONCAT(ROUND(t2.yhsCount / t1.yxsCount * 100, 2), '%'), '0.00%') percentage from (select ifnull(sum(oi.number), 0) yxsCount from sys_dept d left join pw_order_item oi on d.dept_id = oi.DEPT_ID where d.del_flag = 0 and year(oi.create_time) = year(now()) and (d.dept_id = #{deptId} or d.ancestors like '%${deptId}%')) t1, (select ifnull(sum(oi.number), 0) yhsCount from sys_dept d left join pw_order_item oi on d.dept_id = oi.DEPT_ID where d.del_flag = 0 and year(oi.create_time) = year(now()) and (d.dept_id = #{deptId} or d.ancestors like '%${deptId}%') and oi.is_recycle = 1) t2
